summary: This document is an email chain from August 16, 2019, between employees of T&M Protection Resources discussing harassment emails sent to Mark Epstein and a missing YouTube video link. The video was described as a 'mock interview' between Jeff (likely Jeffrey Epstein) and Steve Bannon containing comments about Trump and their relationship.

persons.name: Richard Frankel
persons.context: Receives and forwards an email chain about harassment emails targeting Mark Epstein and a missing YouTube video.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.role: Subject of discussion, recipient of harassing emails
persons.context: Brother of Jeffrey Epstein who received harassing emails and was seeking a missing YouTube video link of a mock interview between Jeff and Steve Bannon.

persons.name: William Barry
persons.role: Cyber Security Analyst at T&M Protection Resources
persons.context: Analyzed email headers from harassing emails sent to Mark Epstein and provided a zip file with the analysis.

persons.name: Simon Ragona
persons.role: Managing Director of Cybersecurity at T&M Protection Resources
persons.context: Spoke with Mark Epstein, obtained original emails, and provided details about the missing YouTube video involving Jeff and Steve Bannon.

persons.name: William Weller
persons.role: Recipient of internal emails at T&M Protection Resources
persons.context: Included in email discussions regarding the analysis of harassing emails sent to Mark Epstein.

persons.name: Steven Petronio
persons.role: Copied on internal emails at T&M Protection Resources
persons.context: CC'd on emails discussing the analysis of harassing emails sent to Mark Epstein.

persons.name: Jeff
persons.role: Sender of email with YouTube link (implied to be Jeffrey Epstein)
persons.context: Reportedly sent Mark Epstein an email containing a YouTube link to a 'mock interview' with Steve Bannon, which was later taken down.

persons.name: Steve Bannon
persons.context: Was featured in a 'mock interview' YouTube video with Jeff (Epstein) that contained comments about Trump and their relationship.

persons.name: Trump
persons.context: His relationship with Jeff (Epstein) was reportedly discussed in the missing YouTube 'mock interview' video.

connections.description: Mark Epstein is the brother of Jeffrey Epstein ('Jeff'), as indicated by the context of Jeff sending him an email.
Were participants in a 'mock interview' YouTube video that discussed their relationship with Trump.
Their relationship was a topic of discussion in the missing YouTube video between Jeff and Steve Bannon.
Both are employees of T&M Protection Resources collaborating on the Mark Epstein email analysis.
Both are cybersecurity staff at T&M Protection Resources working on analyzing harassing emails sent to Mark Epstein.
Simon Ragona spoke with Mark Epstein to obtain original harassing emails for analysis.

events.title: Email analysis regarding harassment of Mark Epstein
events.description: T&M Protection Resources employees discuss analyzing harassing emails sent to Mark Epstein and a missing YouTube video link.

events.title: Jeff sends YouTube link to Mark Epstein
events.description: Jeff (Epstein) sent Mark Epstein an email containing a YouTube link to a 'mock interview' with Steve Bannon, which Mark viewed but later found taken down.

locations: New York, NY 10169 (T&M Protection Resources office at 230 Park Avenue, Suite 440)
keyFacts: Mark Epstein, Jeffrey Epstein's brother, was receiving harassing emails in August 2019, prompting an investigation by T&M Protection Resources.
A cybersecurity firm analyzed email headers, finding they routed through UK Yahoo email servers.
Mark Epstein had previously received an email from Jeff (Jeffrey Epstein) containing a YouTube link to a 'mock interview' between Jeff and Steve Bannon.
The YouTube video contained comments about Trump and the relationship between Jeff and Trump, and was taken down shortly after Mark Epstein viewed it.
The email chain demonstrates ongoing security concerns and digital communications within Epstein's circle after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest.
